row.process:
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH !--------------------------------------------------------------- ! Execute ANALYZE on ah_cleaned table now." !--------------------------------------------------------------- :SET &ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND# = "ANALYZE VERBOSE ah_cleaned;" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Execute ANALYZE on ah_cleaned table now." :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
:SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = &ANALYTICS_PG_PASSWORD# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
:SET &ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND# = "PGPASSWORD=$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD LC_MESSAGES='en_US.UTF-8' &ANALYTICS_PSQL_PATH#/psql -t -A -h &ANALYTICS_PG_HOST# -p &ANALYTICS_PG_PORT# -U &ANALYTICS_PG_USERNAME# -d &ANALYTICS_PG_DATABASE# -c ""&ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND#""" :P &ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND# &ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
!--------------------------------------------------------------- ! Execute ANALYZE on ara_execution_cleaned table now." !--------------------------------------------------------------- :SET &ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND# = "ANALYZE VERBOSE ara_execution_cleaned;" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Execute ANALYZE on ara_execution_cleaned table now." :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
:SET &ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND# = "PGPASSWORD=$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD LC_MESSAGES='en_US.UTF-8' &ANALYTICS_PSQL_PATH#/psql -t -A -h &ANALYTICS_PG_HOST# -p &ANALYTICS_PG_PORT# -U &ANALYTICS_PG_USERNAME# -d &ANALYTICS_PG_DATABASE# -c ""&ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND#""" :P &ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND# &ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
!--------------------------------------------------------------- ! Execute ANALYZE on laslm_cleaned table now." !--------------------------------------------------------------- :SET &ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND# = "ANALYZE VERBOSE laslm_cleaned;" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Execute ANALYZE on laslm_cleaned table now." :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
:SET &ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND# = "PGPASSWORD=$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD LC_MESSAGES='en_US.UTF-8' &ANALYTICS_PSQL_PATH#/psql -t -A -h &ANALYTICS_PG_HOST# -p &ANALYTICS_PG_PORT# -U &ANALYTICS_PG_USERNAME# -d &ANALYTICS_PG_DATABASE# -c ""&ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND#""" :P &ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND# &ANALYTICS_PSQL_COMMAND# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Successfully terminated job: PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS.PRV.JOB.DATASTORE_OPTIMIZE@UNIX." :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
